description: This file defines the ScheduleModel class which manages CRUD operations related to doctor schedules in the database, including upsert, retrieval, listing, and removal of schedule entries.

classes.name: ScheduleModel
classes.description: A model class for handling doctor schedules, including methods for inserting/updating, retrieving, listing, and deleting schedule data.

methods.name: upsert({ doctor_id, date, plan_type, notes })
methods.description: Inserts or updates a schedule record for a specific doctor and date.

methods.name: getByDoctorAndDate(doctor_id, date)
methods.description: Retrieves the schedule for a specific doctor on a specific date.

methods.name: listByDoctor({ doctor_id, start, end })
methods.description: Lists all schedules for a doctor within a specified date range.

methods.name: remove(doctor_id, date)
methods.description: Deletes the schedule entry for a specific doctor and date.

ctags.name: listByDoctor
ctags.pattern: /^  static async listByDoctor({ doctor_id, start, end }) {$/

ctags.name: upsert
ctags.pattern: /^  static async upsert({ doctor_id, date, plan_type, notes }) {$/
